questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: When i was ten yeard old, i walked in the moutain. When i'felt on a rock. The monitor has needed tp call a helicopter. At the hospital, the medecine told me that i has broken my leg. This the longer holliday of my life, sit on a sofa all of the day. The worst in this history, it was the second day of the beging of the holliday, i must waited eleven to back home
